section.name: s2
section.heading: Appointment of addiction treatment centres
section.content: Each place or building specified in the Schedule is appointed to be an addiction treatment centre for the cure and rehabilitation of persons found guilty of a relevant offence who are addicted to any dangerous drug.

section.name: s1
section.content: The place and buildings situated at 110 Tai Lam Chung Road, Tuen Mun, New Territories, known as the Tai Lam Centre for Women

section.name: s2
section.content: The island of Hei Ling Chau and the buildings on the island (other than those parts of the buildings known as the Nei Kwu Correctional Institution, the Lai Sun Correctional Institution and the Hei Ling Chau Correctional Institution), known as the Hei Ling Chau Addiction Treatment Centre

section.name: s3
section.content: The place and buildings known as Blocks “K”, “L”, 57, 58, 59, 60, 79, 80 and 81 and situated on the island of Hei Ling Chau, known as the Lai Sun Correctional Institution

section.name: s4
section.content: Those parts of the buildings known as Dormitories 9A and 9B in the Lai King Correctional Institution situated at 16 Wa Tai Road, Kwai Chung, New Territories

section.name: s5
section.content: Those parts of the buildings situated on the island of Hei Ling Chau, known as the Nei Kwu Correctional Institution

section.name: s6
section.content: The place and buildings situated at 163 Ho Sheung Heung Road, Sheung Shui, New Territories, known as the Lo Wu Correctional Institution

section.name: s7
section.content: The place and buildings situated at 399 Clear Water Bay Road, Sai Kung, New Territories, known as the Pik Uk Correctional Institution (L.N. 48 of 2025)
